author: wn.com
title: Air pollution still public’s top concern (The Central People's Government of the People's Republic of ...
text: ( Source : The Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China ) Almost 78 percent of complaints the public made to the national environmental watchdog on its hotline in the first half of this year was about air pollution.
